definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

sentences.english: People often eat liangpi with it together.
sentences.chinese: 人們經常跟涼皮一起喫。

sentences.english: Persimmon cake, vegetable soup, cold noodles, etc.
sentences.chinese: 柿子餅，芙蓉湯，涼皮什麼的。

sentences.english: Cold noodles are a local dish in Southern Shaanxi and Central Shaanxi.
sentences.chinese: 涼皮是陝西關中及陝南地區的傳統小喫。

definition: meat and bread soup (a specialty of Shaanxi cuisine)
zha jiang mian: ground pork simmered with salty fermented soybean paste (or other sauce) over thick wheat noodles
hot spicy soup (often sold in street stalls)
Sichuan noodles with a spicy and numbing sauce
lit. meat wedged in steamed bun/"Chinese burger"/sliced meat sandwich popular in north China
fried chicken pieces with salt and pepper/Taiwan-style fried chicken
